item.title: Auto-Vote Release
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Not too keen on this, needs convention attention, there’s no document type declared, there’s internal styling which clogs up the document and that’s without even reading in depth. There’s major issues that need to be fixed before anyone even thinks about using this, try fixing it yourself then re-releasing :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-Vote Release
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I found this lying around in my Desktop. It’s a simple Auto-Vote, You’ll need to change some bits and bobs. There’s a crappy tutorial made by me on the end of this topic on how to make it into a page.

[code=html4strict]

~ Project Arcane Vote4Cash body { font-family: calibri, tahoma, verdana, arial, sans-serif; background: #1b1b1b url('images/bg.gif'); color: white }
RsPsCoding google Rune-Server

Username:
